Description.Origin: You drank too much and you are now dying
Description.Translation: 你饮酒过量，代谢紊乱，气息奄奄

Description.Origin: Damage, critical strike chance, movement speed, and melee speed boosted during a Blood Moon, life regen and defense reduced
Description.Translation: 血月时，伤害、暴击率、移动速度和近战攻速提升，生命恢复速度和防御力降低

Description.Origin: Life regen, movement speed, and wing flight time boosted, you are floaty and defense is reduced
Description.Translation: 生命恢复速度、移动速度、翅膀飞行时间提升，获得漂浮能力，防御力降低

Description.Origin: Mana regen rate and fire weapon damage boosted, defense reduced
Description.Translation: 魔力恢复速度增加，火属性武器伤害提升，防御力降低

Description.Origin: 25% increased damage, -10 life regen and -40 defense
Description.Translation: 增加25%伤害，减少10每秒生命恢复值和40防御力

Description.Origin: Nature-based weapon damage and damage reduction boosted, life regen reduced
Description.Translation: 自然属性武器伤害提升，增加伤害减免，降低生命恢复速度

Description.Origin: You feel fabulous
Description.Translation: 你体会到了一种难以置信的美妙

Description.Origin: Fire weapon damage boosted, life regen reduced
Description.Translation: 火属性武器伤害提升，降低生命恢复速度

Description.Origin: Defense and movement speed reduced
Description.Translation: 降低防御力和移动速度

Description.Origin: Reduced duration to most debuffs, defense and life regen reduced
Description.Translation: 减少绝大部分减益的持续时间，防御力和生命恢复速度降低。

Description.Origin: Defense and damage reduction boosted, life regen reduced
Description.Translation: 提升防御力和伤害减免，降低生命恢复速度

Description.Origin: Damage, critical strike chance, and knockback boosted, life regen reduced
Description.Translation: 提升伤害、暴击率和武器击退，降低生命恢复速度

Description.Origin: Life regen reduced
Description.Translation: 生命恢复速度降低

Description.Origin: Movement speed and life regen boosted, defense reduced
Description.Translation: 增加移动速度和生命恢复速度，降低防御力

Description.Origin: Piercing projectile damage boosted, life regen reduced
Description.Translation: 增加穿透弹幕伤害，降低生命恢复速度

Description.Origin: Max mana and magic damage increased. Defense, mana usage, and life regen reduced
Description.Translation: 增加最大魔力值和魔法伤害，降低防御力、魔力值消耗和生命恢复速度

Description.Origin: Damage, critical strike chance, damage reduction, defense, and knockback boosted during daytime, life regen reduced
Description.Translation: 在白天增加伤害、暴击率、伤害减免、防御力和武器击退，降低生命恢复速度

Description.Origin: Damage, critical strike chance, damage reduction, defense, and knockback boosted during daytime, life regen reduced
Description.Translation: 在白天增加伤害、暴击率、伤害减免、防御力和武器击退，降低生命恢复速度

Description.Origin: You see the world for what it truly is...and you also have a 50% increase to all damage
Description.Translation: 于迷糊间见世界本质……同时增加50%伤害

Description.Origin: Damage and critical stike chance boosted, defense and life regen reduced
Description.Translation: 增加伤害和暴击率，降低防御力和生命恢复速度

Description.Origin: Damage, critical strike chance, and knockback boosted, defense reduced
Description.Translation: 增加伤害、暴击率和武器击退，降低防御力

Description.Origin: Magic damage boosted, life regen and defense reduced
Description.Translation: 增加魔法伤害，降低生命恢复速度和防御力

Description.Origin: The plates are regenerating
Description.Translation: 外壳金属正在自我修复中

Description.Origin: Your abyssal madness is recharging
Description.Translation: 深渊狂乱效果正在蓄能

Description.Origin: Your Abyssal Mirror's dodge is recharging
Description.Translation: 深渊之镜的免伤效果正在恢复

Description.Origin: Your blood frenzy is recharging
Description.Translation: 鲜血狂怒效果正在蓄能

Description.Origin: Your souls are recharging
Description.Translation: 幽火游魂正在你的身边聚集

Description.Origin: Revive is recharging
Description.Translation: 复活能力正在恢复

Description.Origin: A mysterious force prevents the absorption of draconic energy
Description.Translation: 一股奇异的力量阻止你继续吸收神龙的加护

Description.Origin: Your Eclipse Mirror's dodge is recharging
Description.Translation: 日蚀之镜的暗日爆炸正在蓄能

Description.Origin: The Flesh Totem effect is recharging
Description.Translation: 血肉图腾的接触伤害降低效果正在恢复

Description.Origin: 10% increase to all damage; godslayer effect is recharging
Description.Translation: 增加10%伤害，弑神者盔甲效果正在恢复

Description.Origin: The shield is regenerating
Description.Translation: 冰盾正在重新凝结

Description.Origin: Your Ink Bomb is recharging
Description.Translation: 墨水炸弹效果正在恢复

Description.Origin: Your Sand Cloak is recharging
Description.Translation: 沙尘斗篷效果正在恢复

Description.Origin: Your dodge is recharging
Description.Translation: 冲刺免伤效果正在恢复

Description.Origin: Your cloak is recharging
Description.Translation: 龙蒿披风的接触伤害降低效果正在恢复

Description.Origin: Your immunity is recharging
Description.Translation: 龙蒿无敌效果正在蓄能

Description.Origin: Your soul is being consumed
Description.Translation: 你的灵魂正在毁灭

Description.Origin: Your flesh is melting off
Description.Translation: 你的血肉正在被幻星熔蚀

Description.Origin: Rapid health loss
Description.Translation: 生命快速流失

Description.Origin: Your blood is on fire
Description.Translation: 你的血液沸腾了

Description.Origin: The brimstone lava sears your flesh
Description.Translation: 硫磺火岩浆的烧灼难以承受

Description.Origin: Aquatic pressure
Description.Translation: 深海压强似乎作用于身

Description.Origin: Another burning debuff
Description.Translation: 来自异界的恐怖燃烧减益

Description.Origin: Your flesh is burning off
Description.Translation: 你的血肉在燃烧

Description.Origin: Dissolving from holy light
Description.Translation: 神圣之光正将你焚化

Description.Origin: You've gone too far from the Profaned Goddess!
Description.Translation: 你离亵渎天神太远了！

Description.Origin: Losing life
Description.Translation: 生命流失

Description.Origin: Incinerated by lunar rays
Description.Translation: 被月之射线瓦解

Description.Origin: Rotting from the inside
Description.Translation: 从内部腐烂

Description.Origin: Losing life
Description.Translation: 失去生命

Description.Origin: Clamfest
Description.Translation: 一顿大餐

Description.Origin: Blood
Description.Translation: 血

Description.Origin: Clam clap
Description.Translation: 扇贝轻夹

Description.Origin: The acidic water burns away your flesh
Description.Translation: 有毒的硫磺海水正在烧灼你的皮肤

Description.Origin: Vape
Description.Translation: 蒸汽波是极美的

Description.Origin: You are weak
Description.Translation: 你很虚弱

Description.Origin: You beat DoG while drunk, you are truly fabulous!
Description.Translation: 你喝高了还打败了神长直，心朗气清，足以畅叙幽情！

Description.Origin: The seat is toasty.  That is all
Description.Translation: 坐着温暖舒适。那就足够了

Description.Origin: You are riding a shadow dragon
Description.Translation: 你骑着一只暗影飞龙

Description.Origin: Drill
Description.Translation: 钻头

Description.Origin: BEAN MAN. BEAN DO T H E  B EA N IS HER E
Description.Translation: BEAN MAN. BEAN DO T H E  B EA N IS HER E

Description.Origin: You are riding an angry dog
Description.Translation: 你正驾驭着愤怒雪狗

Description.Origin: Looks like you'll have to take care of it now
Description.Translation: 看起来你现在应该好好照顾这只小龙

Description.Origin: Little astral buggy
Description.Translation: 小小的幻星机器

Description.Origin: Be careful not to pop the bubble
Description.Translation: 小心不要戳破泡泡

Description.Origin: A guardian angel is following you.
Description.Translation: 守护天使正在跟着你

Description.Origin: You must be desperate for company
Description.Translation: 它在身边陪伴，一定让你很沮丧

Description.Origin: Protect her or suffer in agony
Description.Translation: 保护她或迎接苦难的折磨，二选一

Description.Origin: What? Were you expecting someone else?
Description.Translation: 什么？你期待还能召唤出谁？

Description.Origin: The trash man is following you.
Description.Translation: 垃圾男正在跟着你

Description.Origin: Fox Pet? FOX PET
Description.Translation:
狐狸宠物？
狐 狸

Description.Origin: They just did! The Furtastic Duo will accompany you!
Description.Translation: 它们做到了！毛茸茸的伙伴们围在你周围

Description.Origin: A loyal friend accompanies you.
Description.Translation: 一位忠诚的朋友陪在你身旁

Description.Origin: Small and cute
Description.Translation: 小而可爱

Description.Origin: Radioactive but adorable
Description.Translation: 具放射性的可爱生物

Description.Origin: Lightning never strikes the same place twice
Description.Translation: 闪电从不会两次击中同一个地方

Description.Origin: Watching over you with supreme calamitous energy... How adorable
Description.Translation: 她以那充盈着灾难性能量的目光注视着你... 真是可爱

Description.Origin: Small and cute
Description.Translation:
音轻体柔，小巧玲珑
但有时会变成……咸鱼？

Description.Origin: Eh? No way it's an oni.
Description.Translation: 额，这不可能是鬼

Description.Origin: The floating flame seems to uplift your very spirit
Description.Translation: 飘浮着的火焰让你的灵魂升华

Description.Origin: Spawn rates around the candle are boosted!
Description.Translation: 周围刷怪率提升！

Description.Origin: The corruption empowers you
Description.Translation: 腐化之地的力量灌注双拳

Description.Origin: The crimson empowers you
Description.Translation: 血腥之地的力量充盈于身

Description.Origin: Its brilliant light suffuses those nearby with hope
Description.Translation: 它耀眼的光芒给周围的人带来了希望

Description.Origin: Neither rain nor wind can snuff its undying flame
Description.Translation: 暴风骤雨也无法熄灭这执着的火

Description.Origin: Spawn rates around the candle are reduced!
Description.Translation: 周围刷怪率降低！

Description.Origin: Its hateful glow flickers with ire
Description.Translation: 它那惹人厌的火光只会激起愤怒

Description.Origin: You are a snowman now!
Description.Translation: 你是个雪人了！

Description.Origin: Your nose has been stolen!
Description.Translation: 你的鼻子被别人偷走了！

Description.Origin: Melee weapons inflict abyssal flames, 15% increased movement speed
Description.Translation: 近战武器造成深渊之火减益，增加15%移动速度

Description.Origin: Abyssal creature's detection radius reduced
Description.Translation: 降低深渊生物侦测到你的可能性

Description.Origin: Melee and rogue attacks break enemy armor
Description.Translation: 近战和盗贼攻击会击碎敌人的护甲

Description.Origin: Melee and rogue attacks break enemy armor
Description.Translation: 近战和盗贼攻击会粉碎敌人的护甲

Description.Origin: Extreme mana recovery
Description.Translation: 魔力极速恢复

Description.Origin: If only I knew... ~Cirrus
Description.Translation: 如果只有我知道……～赛克斯

Description.Origin: Don't let the blood get to your head
Description.Translation: 不要让血液冲昏头脑

Description.Origin: Increased jump height, jump speed, and fall damage resistance
Description.Translation: 增加跳跃高度、速度和摔落伤害减免。

Description.Origin: Your heart is pure
Description.Translation: 你心灵纯净

Description.Origin: You are immune to fall damage
Description.Translation: 你免疫摔落伤害

Description.Origin: You are sucking up all the items
Description.Translation: 你吸收着世界上所有的物品

Description.Origin: The power of a dragon courses through your veins
Description.Translation: 神龙的力量顺着你的血流灌注全身

Description.Origin: Gravity is now normal in space, immunity to distorted
Description.Translation: 在太空中恢复正常重力作用，免疫扭曲减益

Description.Origin: Increased damage, increased movement and flight speed, and all attacks inflict holy fire
Description.Translation: 增加伤害、移动速度和飞行速度，所有攻击附带神圣之火减益

Description.Origin: Immune to damage and most debuffs
Description.Translation: 获得无敌效果，免疫大多数减益

Description.Origin: You can see everything
Description.Translation: 你能看透世间万物

Description.Origin:
Stealth regenerates at 10% speed while moving
The boost increases to 20% at night and 30% during an eclipse
Description.Translation:
盗贼潜行值在移动时以10%速度恢复
在晚上恢复速度变为20%，日食时恢复速度变为30%

Description.Origin: Life regen boosted, more during daytime, and hearts heal more HP
Description.Translation: 生命恢复速度增加，在白天恢复更快，红心能回复更多生命值

Description.Origin: Increased crit chance, increased movement and flight speed, and you gain more rage when damaged
Description.Translation: 增加暴击率、移动速度和飞行速度，你受到攻击时更加更多怒气值

Description.Origin: You are healed by a fraction of the damage you take
Description.Translation: 你受伤时，会按比例回复所受伤害一部分的生命值

Description.Origin:
Increased wing flight time and speed
True melee hits restore wing flight time
Description.Translation:
增加翅膀飞行时间和飞行速度
真近战武器击中怪物时恢复一定的翅膀飞行时间

Description.Origin: Summons an aura of electricity
Description.Translation: 召唤一个特斯拉电球

Description.Origin: You feel tanky
Description.Translation: 你感觉可以坦住成年幻海妖龙

Description.Origin: Enemy contact damage is reduced, the lower their health the greater the reduction
Description.Translation: 怪物接触伤害降低，生命值越低降低幅度越大

Description.Origin: You feel like you can break the world in two...with your bare hands!
Description.Translation: 你感觉可以把世界撕成了两半……空手足矣！

Description.Origin: Spawn rates are reduced
Description.Translation: 刷怪率大幅降低

Description.Origin: Spawn rates are boosted
Description.Translation: 刷怪率大幅提升

Description.Origin: You are made of metal
Description.Translation: 你是铁打的

Description.Origin: The plates will absorb 15% damage
Description.Translation: 外壳金属会吸收15%的伤害

Description.Origin: Increased damage, critical strike chance, and tentacle aggression/range
Description.Translation: 增加伤害、暴击率和深渊触手的攻击距离和攻击性

Description.Origin: 150% damage boost.
Description.Translation: 增加150%伤害

Description.Origin: Empowered by otherworldly spirits
Description.Translation: 被异界之魂祝福

Description.Origin:
You are blessed by Amidias
Lets you breathe underwater, even in the Abyss!
Just don't get hit...
Description.Translation:
你被海神祝福了
让你即使在深渊也拥有水下呼吸的能力！
小心别受伤…

Description.Origin: Contact damage is reduced and melee stats are greatly increased
Description.Translation: 怪物接触伤害降低，近战属性大幅提高

Description.Origin: The active boss is reducing spawn rates...a lot
Description.Translation: 你面前的Boss大大降低了其他怪物的刷新率

Description.Origin: Your next attack is boosted and you are more resilient
Description.Translation: 你的下一次攻击伤害提高，防御属性增加

Description.Origin: You feel as cold as the empty expanse of outer space
Description.Translation: 寒气逼人，犹如身于宙域

Description.Origin: Movement speed reduced, other stats buffed
Description.Translation: 移动速度降低，增加伤害、暴击率和防御力

Description.Origin: 30 defense and +30% damage reduction, but...
Description.Translation: 增加30点防御力和30%伤害减免，但是…

Description.Origin: Your defenses and muscles are strong
Description.Translation: 防御力增加，你的肌肉更加强壮

Description.Origin: Your anger has made you more durable. Boosts max life by 5%.
Description.Translation: 你的怒火使你身体更加强壮。增加5%最大生命值

Description.Origin: Absorbs 15% damage from the next hit you take, then shatters
Description.Translation: 吸收下一次受伤时15%的伤害，然后冰盾碎裂

Description.Origin: Resistant to cold effects
Description.Translation: 对寒冷效果具有抗性

Description.Origin: Increased defense and life regen
Description.Translation: 增加防御力和生命恢复速度

Description.Origin: The Northern Star empowers your weapon
Description.Translation: 北极星与你手中的武器产生共鸣

Description.Origin: 50% damage boost. Can be boosted by other items up to 110%.
Description.Translation: 增加50%伤害。能使用其他物品提升至110%

Description.Origin: You are angry
Description.Translation: 爷怒了

Description.Origin: 10% increased damage, 5% increased crit chance, and 10% increased melee speed
Description.Translation: 增加10%伤害、5%暴击率和10%近战速度

Description.Origin: Speed is boosted
Description.Translation: 移动速度提升

Description.Origin: You are invulnerable
Description.Translation: 你处于无敌状态

Description.Origin: You are a siren now
Description.Translation: 女装有趣吗？

Description.Origin: You are a siren now
Description.Translation: 女装有趣吗？

Description.Origin: 15% increased max speed and acceleration
Description.Translation: 增加15% 移动速度和加速度

Description.Origin: Minion damage boosted by 10%
Description.Translation: 召唤物伤害提升10%

Description.Origin: Defense boosted by 5 and damage reduction boosted by 5%
Description.Translation: 增加5点防御力和5%伤害减免

Description.Origin: Regenerating life
Description.Translation: 恢复生命

Description.Origin: Contact damage is reduced
Description.Translation: 怪物接触伤害降低

Description.Origin: You are immune
Description.Translation: 你现在无敌了

Description.Origin: Rapid healing
Description.Translation: 极速生命恢复

Description.Origin: 30% increased melee damage and 10% increased melee crit chance
Description.Translation: 增加30%近战伤害和10%近战暴击率

Description.Origin: Rage of the cosmos
Description.Translation: 宇宙的怒火

Description.Origin: Wrath of the cosmos
Description.Translation: 宇宙的怒气

Description.Origin: Your armor is shredded
Description.Translation: 你的护甲被撕裂了

Description.Origin: You've been burnt out and your guardians are less effective
Description.Translation: 你受伤了，守卫们效果降低

Description.Origin: The clams have been angered!
Description.Translation: 远古巨蛤怒了！

Description.Origin: All damage taken is increased by 25%
Description.Translation: 所有受到的伤害增加25%

Description.Origin: Excessive nutrients restrict your movement
Description.Translation: 过多的营养物质拖慢了你的步伐

Description.Origin: Cannot move
Description.Translation: 无法移动

Description.Origin: Your wing time is reduced by 50%, infinite flight is disabled
Description.Translation: 翅膀飞行时间减少50%，无限飞行失效

Description.Origin: Your wing time is reduced by 75%, infinite flight is disabled
Description.Translation: 翅膀飞行时间减少75%，无限飞行失效

Description.Origin: The abyssal creatures have spotted you!
Description.Translation: 深渊生物发现你了！

Description.Origin: The icy waters restrict your breathing
Description.Translation: 冰冷的水使你无法呼吸

Description.Origin: Cannot move and defense is shattered
Description.Translation: 无法移动，防御破碎

Description.Origin: The horror...
Description.Translation: 恐惧之心…

Description.Origin: Your skin is burning off
Description.Translation: 你的皮肤正被侵蚀

Description.Origin: Damage reduction reduced
Description.Translation: 伤害减免降低

Description.Origin: Slowed down
Description.Translation: 减速

Description.Origin: Can't move
Description.Translation: 无法移动

Description.Origin: You are crying
Description.Translation: 蓝瘦香菇

Description.Origin: Your limbs have begun to corrode
Description.Translation: 你的肢体开始发生腐蚀

Description.Origin: Time is slowed
Description.Translation: 时间流逝减缓

Description.Origin: Defense and protection reduced
Description.Translation: 防御力和防御属性降低

Description.Origin: Movement is being warped
Description.Translation: 移动被空间翘曲影响

Description.Origin: Your vertical movement is weakened
Description.Translation: 垂直移动能力弱化

Description.Origin: Death approaches; defense, attack power, and life regen reduced
Description.Translation:
死亡正在逼近
防御力、攻击力和生命恢复速度降低

Description.Origin: The valkyrie will protect you
Description.Translation: 天武神会保护你

Description.Origin: Ancient yet so dangerous
Description.Translation: 来自远古，危险无比

Description.Origin: The aquatic star will protect you
Description.Translation: 深海之星会保护你

Description.Origin: The mini astrageldon slime will protect you
Description.Translation: 迷你末世星史莱姆会保护你

Description.Origin: The astral probe will protect you
Description.Translation: 幻星探测器会保护你

Description.Origin: The hydrothermic vent will protect you
Description.Translation: 沸腾渊泉会保护你

Description.Origin: The fighter jet will protect you
Description.Translation: 战斗机会保护你

Description.Origin: The blood clot will protect you
Description.Translation: 血块会保护你

Description.Origin: The brimstone elemental will protect you
Description.Translation: 硫磺火元素会保护你

Description.Origin: The brittle star will protect you
Description.Translation: 脆弱海星会保护你

Description.Origin: The squid will protect you
Description.Translation: 深渊乌贼会保护你

Description.Origin: Calamitas and her brothers will protect you
Description.Translation: 灾厄之影和她的兄弟们会保护你

Description.Origin: The cloud elemental will protect you
Description.Translation: 雨云元素会保护你

Description.Origin: The corroslime will protect you
Description.Translation: 腐化史莱姆会保护你

Description.Origin: The cosmic energy will protect you
Description.Translation: 归虚之灵会保护你

Description.Origin: The cosmilamp will protect you
Description.Translation: 宇宙之光照耀着你

Description.Origin: The crimslime will protect you
Description.Translation: 血腥史莱姆会保护你

Description.Origin: The daedalus crystal will protect you
Description.Translation: 代达罗斯水晶会保护你

Description.Origin: The dank creeper will protect you
Description.Translation: 沼泽之眼会保护你

Description.Origin: The red devil will protect you
Description.Translation: 赤红恶魔与你同在

Description.Origin: The elemental axe will protect you
Description.Translation: 元素之斧会保护你

Description.Origin: The ascened Cooper will protect you
Description.Translation: 寒古宙以来冰封的力量晶体为你而战

Description.Origin: The fungal clump will protect you
Description.Translation: 真菌块会保护你

Description.Origin: The gladiator swords will protect you
Description.Translation: 角斗士短剑在你身旁飞舞

Description.Origin: The hermit crab will protect you
Description.Translation: 寄居蟹会保护你

Description.Origin: The herring will protect you
Description.Translation: 鲱鱼群会保护你

Description.Origin: All elementals will protect you
Description.Translation: 所有元素之灵给予你祝福，为你而战

Description.Origin: The ice clasper will protect you
Description.Translation: 噬魂冰虫会保护你

Description.Origin: The mechworm will protect you
Description.Translation: 虚空吞噬者在你身旁飞翔

Description.Origin: The phantom will protect you
Description.Translation: 噬魂幽花的灵魂碎片主动帮助你

Description.Origin: The miniature plantera will protect you
Description.Translation:
迷你世纪之花会保护你
是你吗，世纪小花？

Description.Origin: The healer will heal your wounds!
Description.Translation: 治疗守卫会治疗你的伤势！

Description.Origin: The reaver orb will protect you
Description.Translation: 掠夺者毒球会保护你

Description.Origin: Sleep beneath the Cherry Blossoms, Red-White Butterfly
Description.Translation:
回归于花下好了，春之亡灵！
沉眠于花下好了，红白之蝶！

Description.Origin: The sandnado will protect you
Description.Translation: 沙鲨龙卷会保护你

Description.Origin: The sand elemental will heal you
Description.Translation: 沙元素会治疗你

Description.Origin: The sand elemental will protect you
Description.Translation: 沙元素会保护你

Description.Origin: The shellfish will protect you
Description.Translation: 沉沦之贝会保护你

Description.Origin: The crystal will protect you
Description.Translation: 始源林海水晶在你头顶闪耀

Description.Origin: A bit too bright, but it helps you
Description.Translation: 有点亮，毕竟是颗蓝矮星

Description.Origin: The solar spirit will protect you
Description.Translation: 太阳之灵会保护你

Description.Origin: The solar god spirit will protect you
Description.Translation: 太阳神之灵会保护你

Description.Origin: The squirrel squire will protect you
Description.Translation: 松鼠侍从会保护你

Description.Origin: The slime god will protect you
Description.Translation: 史莱姆之神会保护你

Description.Origin: The urchin will protect you
Description.Translation: 海胆会保护你

Description.Origin: The siren will protect you
Description.Translation: 海妖塞壬会保护你

Description.Origin: The wulfrum droid will protect you
Description.Translation: 钨钢无人机会保护你

Description.Origin: The Son of Yharon will protect you
Description.Translation:
年幼的小龙陪在你身旁
大肥鸡？

Description.Origin: Your use of brimstone magic has left you exhausted
Description.Translation: 硫火魔法使你筋疲力尽

Description.Origin: Your plague blackout ability is recharging
Description.Translation: 你的瘟疫爆发能力正在缓冲

Description.Origin: Little acid buggy
Description.Translation: 淘气小酸虫

Description.Origin: Eats butterflies
Description.Translation: 这东西吃蝴蝶

Description.Origin: Dark magic empowers your attacks at the cost of your life
Description.Translation: 黑魔法赋予你强大的、以生命为代价的攻击

Description.Origin: Minion damage boosted by 15%
Description.Translation: 增加15%仆从伤害

Description.Origin: Defense boosted by 7 and damage reduction boosted by 7%
Description.Translation: 增加7防御和7%防御减免

Description.Origin: Regenerating life
Description.Translation: 恢复生命

Description.Origin: The profaned soul within has been defiled by the powerful magic of a supreme witch
Description.Translation: 亵渎之魂被一位强大女巫的魔法所玷污

Description.Origin: The weather slows your movement as you freeze to death. You need to look for equipment to protect you from the cold.
Description.Translation: 寒冷的会逐渐减缓你的速度直到你冻死.你需要某些东西来抵御严寒.

Description.Origin: The overwhelming heat weakens your bodily functions. You need to look for equipment to protect you from the heat.
Description.Translation: 势不可挡的高温会削弱你的身体机能.你需要某些东西来让你免受高温.

Description.Origin: A cute forest spirit is following you
Description.Translation: 可爱的森林精灵正跟着你

Description.Origin: Big happy family
Description.Translation: 幸福大家庭

Description.Origin: A hot, searing flower is floating uncomfortably close to you
Description.Translation: 一朵灼热的花儿在你头顶浮动

Description.Origin: The magic of the ancient ice castle will aid you
Description.Translation: 古老冰霜城堡的魔法会帮助你

Description.Origin: The powerful raven will protect you
Description.Translation: 强大的渡鸦会保护你

Description.Origin: The cosmic gunship will protect you
Description.Translation: 宇宙炮艇会保护你

Description.Origin: En garde
Description.Translation: 时刻戒护

Description.Origin: Does it want something from you?
Description.Translation: 它是不是想从你身上索取些什么?

Description.Origin: The endo hydra will protect you... for some reason
Description.Translation: 冰洋九头蛇将保护你... 因为某些原因

Description.Origin: A cold, prickly flower is floating uncomfortably close to you
Description.Translation: 一朵冰冷的花在你头顶浮动

Description.Origin: A small plague bee is following you
Description.Translation: 一只小瘟疫蜂跟着你

Description.Origin: The haunted dishes will protect you
Description.Translation: 缠怨鬼碟会保护你

Description.Origin: A blade is orbiting you
Description.Translation: 淬焰古刀围绕着你旋转

Description.Origin: The hat carries your soul, bound by a contract
Description.Translation: 我会一直留着你的灵魂当人质，但你找到的东西都得留下！

Description.Origin: A strange UFO is observing you, and it's making you very uncomfortable
Description.Translation: 一个奇怪的UFO在观察你，这令你很不舒服

Description.Origin: The young duke will protect you
Description.Translation: 年轻的硫海公爵保护你

Description.Origin: It’s a shame you can’t hug her
Description.Translation: 很遗憾你不能拥抱她

Description.Origin: A radiant aura protects you
Description.Translation: 一个耀眼的光环保护你

Description.Origin: The baby blood crawler will protect you
Description.Translation: 血爬虫宝宝将保护你

Description.Origin: A skeleton is observing you
Description.Translation: 骷髅在注视着你

Description.Origin: The baby stormlion will protect you
Description.Translation: 风暴蚁狮宝宝将保护你

Description.Origin: A giant plague jet is following you
Description.Translation: 一架瘟疫喷气战机跟着你

Description.Origin: The baby eater of souls will protect you
Description.Translation: 灵魂吞噬者宝宝将保护你

Description.Origin: The baby plaguebringer sees you as the queen
Description.Translation: 瘟疫使者宝宝将你视为它们的女王

Description.Origin: The sulphuric waters empower you
Description.Translation: 硫海之水给予你力量

Description.Origin: The sulphuric waters have a lesser effect on you
Description.Translation: 减少硫海之水对你的影响

Description.Origin: Anger hardens the heart. Boosts max life by 5%.
Description.Translation: 愤怒使你的心脏变得强硬。 增加5%最大生命值。

Description.Origin: A pitifully fragile drone is observing you
Description.Translation: 可怜且脆弱的无人机在注视着你

Description.Origin: You cannot re-summon a relic of resilience
Description.Translation: 你无法再次召唤灵之形

Description.Origin: Your energy shell is recharging
Description.Translation: 能量庇护正在充能

Description.Origin: A father of many floats around you
Description.Translation: 万子千孙之父浮于身畔

Description.Origin: You do less damage
Description.Translation: 你造成的伤害减少

Description.Origin: A perfect unison of balance and beauty
Description.Translation: 均衡与美丽的完美和谐
